name: Dr. Sophia Lee
description: Dr. Lee has over 15 years of experience helping individuals from diverse backgrounds navigate their career paths. She specializes in career transitions, job search strategies, and personal branding.

name: Mr. David Jackson
description: Mr. Jackson is a certified career coach with a passion for helping young adults and college graduates launch their careers. He provides personalized guidance on resume writing, interviewing skills, and career exploration.

name: Ms. Clara Rodriguez
description: Ms. Rodriguez specializes in career development for mid-career professionals seeking career advancement or a change of direction. She offers coaching on leadership development, negotiation skills, and personal branding.

name: Dr. Elizabeth Williams
description: Dr. Williams is a licensed psychologist with expertise in career counseling for individuals facing challenges such as stress, anxiety, or low self-esteem related to their careers. She offers a holistic approach to career development.

name: Mr. Mark Johnson
description: Mr. Johnson is a career counselor with a focus on working with veterans and transitioning military personnel. He helps them translate their skills and experience to civilian careers and provides support with resumes, job applications, and networking.
